title: Op-ed | You canâ€™t go to space on a Ford Pinto and other harsh truths I learned courting venture capital
summary: The article is an op-ed by Ignacio Chechile, former VP of spacecraft engineering at ICEYE, reflecting on his experiences fundraising for a pre-seed space startup. It discusses the challenges of navigating venture capital, the lack of space technology knowledge among investors, and critiques the short-termist approach of the current VC model in the space sector.
